states.name: specification
states.description: This pattern is newly requested and is under specification.

states.name: review
states.description: This pattern is under review and should be released soon. Please check back at a later time.

states.name: complete
states.description: This pattern is complete and ready to use.

states.name: reconsideration
states.description: This pattern was previously released but is under reconsideration. Please hold off on using it.

states.name: deprecated
states.description: This pattern is no longer in use in the latest version(s) of our stylesheet.
